ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We thank Max Auffhammer, Sol Hsiang, Jerry Nelson, and David Lobell for comments on earlier drafts of this paper. T.H. acknowledges the support of the National Science Foundation (award 0951576) under the auspices of the RDCEP project at the University of Chicago and USDA-NIFA, Hatch Project 1003642. F.C.M. acknowledges support of this project by USDA NIFA (award 12225279).
